net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_SavedAttacks_applyRolledExpression
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Determine what a single rolled RollExpression should do by type:
Attack
Determine it the attack hit
Damage
If no attack or on hit apply damage
Save Damage
If no attack or on hit make save then apply damage

arg(0) = id of token being modified
arg(1) = The single expression being applied
arg(2) = The current state for all rolled RollExpressions previously applied

Returns the updated state object.
See dnd5e_SavedAttacks_updateState for format
